Chauncey Leopardi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chauncey_Leopardi 0 Chauncey Leopardi is an American former actor known for playing Michael "Squints" Palledorous in the 1993 movie The Sandlot. Chauncey_Leopardi is an_American_former_actor known for playing Michael_"_Squints_"_Palledorous in the_1993_movie The_Sandlot .
